mapper.select: select r_no, r_name, r_pax, r_price, r_pic, r_explan, r_phone, r.for_no, for_name, fac_no, for_homepage, for_post, for_phone, for_pic, d_no from room r left outer join forest f on r.for_no = f.for_no where r_no = #{no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (res_save, res_now, res_state, res_paydate, res_startdate, res_enddate, res_stay, res_price, res_his, res_fprice, res_forname, r_no, u_id) values (date_add(now(), interval + 1 year), now(), 0, now()+1, '2018-05-05', '2018-05-07', 0, #{r_price}, 0, (#{r_price} * #{r_stay}) , #{for_name}, 2, #{id});
